unpublishedAction.name: getChildReferrals

actionConfiguration.body:
select 
  (
    select 
      email 
    from 
      mongo_api_user 
    where 
      mongo_api_user._id = ref.parent_user_id
  ) as parent_email, 
  (
    select 
      email 
    from 
      mongo_api_user 
    where 
      mongo_api_user._id = ref.child_user_id
  ) as child_email, 
  (
    select 
      synapse_permission 
    from 
      mongo_api_user 
    where 
      mongo_api_user._id = ref.child_user_id
  ) as child_synapse_permission, 
  (
    select 
      case when permission.flag is not null then 'Flagged' else 'Not flagged' end as flag_status 
    from 
      mongo_api_user 
    where 
      mongo_api_user._id = ref.child_user_id
  ) as child_flag_status 
from 
  (
    select 
      _id as user_id 
    from 
      mongo_api_user 
    where 
      1 = 1 
      and email = '{{ lib.getPersonalDetails().email }}'
  ) u 
  left join mongo_api_referral ref on u.user_id = ref.parent_user_id

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
